com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.actions

Class DefaultActionContributionOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.actions.DefaultActionContributionOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionContributionOptions

    public class DefaultActionContributionOptions
extends Object
implements ActionContributionOptions
    A default action contributions options implementation that keeps track of all chosen options, so that they can be applied to an action context.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultActionContributionOptions()
      Creates default action contribution options.

      • addInterceptor

        public void addInterceptor(ActionInterceptor interceptor)
        Description copied from interface: ActionContributionOptions
        Adds an interceptor. It's not possible for the interceptor to intercept the contribution phase, since that's the current phase.
        Specified by:
        addInterceptor in interface ActionContributionOptions
        Parameters:
        interceptor - the interceptor that should be used when creating or executing the action

      • apply

        public void apply(ActionContext actionContext)
           throws AluminumException
        Applies all chosen options to an action context.
        Parameters:
        actionContext - the action context to apply these action contribution options to
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the options can't be applied
